title: Is there high competition for a B.Tech Biotechnology seat?
content: Writing PESSAT on July 10th and I'm worried AF. How easy is it to get a rank within 5K in PESSAT and how high is the competition for a Biotechnology seat? do tell, thnx!

comments.body:
Pessat in general has less competition than its counterparts. Don't focus on rank right now, it's not worth it.

What I can tell you is that getting a rank isn't too hard. I started studying at the end of 11th and got CS. Just choose the questions you know you can answer and do them properly.
Yeah mate but what's the scene for Biotech? Do a lot of people want it? Are there empty seats? Is there a scramble for it? Also, where will I approximately come in PESSAT if I got round 70 in KCET?

Sorry for the late reply. I didn't write cet cause I wasn't elegible. I did write comedk, I got >450 in pessat but managed to get a better rank than that in comedk, so don't worry about how you have done in other exams
